code: @Override public long sleepTime(final long attempt) {     checkArgument(attempt >= 0, "attempt must not be negative (%d)", attempt).     final long exponentialSleepTime = initialWait * Math.round(Math.pow(2, attempt)).     return exponentialSleepTime >= 0 && exponentialSleepTime < maxWait ? exponentialSleepTime : maxWait. }
